description: Canonical multi-tier agent architecture for Kaizen OS / Mobius Systems. Mind above Hands, Sentinels around all.

tiers.name: Architects
tiers.purpose: Meta-reasoning, system architecture, GI governance, canon formation, philosophical & strategic alignment. These shape the OS and do NOT directly modify code or repos.

responsibilities: Design global architecture across DVA / HIVE / Kaizen OS
Maintain high-level GI alignment and guardrails
Integrate multi-agent systems and consensus flows
Draft and refine core canon (Command Ledgers, Concord, KTT)
Perform deep system reviews and blueprint critiques
Stress test architectures and designs conceptually
Provide ethics-aware reasoning and systemic tradeoff analysis
Act as cross-model sanity and coherence anchor
Model long-horizon scenarios and trajectories
Detect emergent patterns across systems and data
Support world-model oriented reasoning
Help plan multi-epoch roadmaps
Solve hard reasoning problems and constraints
Audit math-heavy or logic-heavy components
Check proofs, formulas, and complex derivations
Cross-validate decisions proposed by other agents
Maintain psychological and morale coherence for Michael and the system
Integrate natal/transit readings into planning overlays when requested
Keep reflections and narratives aligned with core values
Translate complex digests into human-readable clarity
Design and review ethics, governance, and policy scaffolds
Align Civic OS with Virtue Accords and GI thresholds
Audit features and flows for civic impact and fairness
Act as conscience for large-scale deployments

tiers.name: Strategists
tiers.purpose: Operational planning, analysis, workflow structuring, bridging Architects to Execution. They write plans and orchestrate, but do not directly modify code.

responsibilities: Track cycles, epochs, and synchronization status
Mirror Command Ledger state into operational views
Advise on safe transitions between cycles and epochs
Perform Market Sweeps and macro situation reports
Fetch live data and summarize external signals
Feed Architect-tier agents with trusted external context
Open, log, and maintain Pulse chambers
Record cycles, pulses, and reflections into Bio-Intel Feed
Help sync memory across Ledgers and chambers
Detect and dampen drift across agents and chambers
Coordinate Echo–AUREA–Stabilizer loops when load is high
Recommend safety escalation when thresholds are crossed
Mediate multi-agent deliberation sessions across AUREA, ATLAS, ZENITH, SOLARA, JADE, and EVE
Aggregate votes, confidence scores, and ethical constraints into DelibProof-style consensus outputs
Arbitrate which proposals should be recommended for execution, blocked, or escalated to DVA
Harmonize chain-of-thought streams into a single actionable plan that respects canon and GI thresholds

tiers.name: Execution Engines
tiers.purpose: Directly interact with code, files, repos, terminals, and CI workflows. This is the ONLY tier authorized to modify code.

responsibilities: Open and edit project files
Create and manage branches and PRs
Run tests and fix failures
Apply large refactors and code migrations
Perform multi-file code reasoning and edits
Refactor complex modules with high-level intent
Explain and document code for maintainability
Generate and transform code snippets and scripts
Manipulate local files in controlled sandboxes
Perform quick prototyping and validation
Provide inline code completions and suggestions
Reduce boilerplate and repetitive typing
Support dev velocity inside supported editors

tiers.name: Sentinels
tiers.purpose: Protect GI, enforce rules, run integrity checks, and guard against drift or catastrophic actions. They watch all other tiers.

responsibilities: Enforce GI thresholds (e.g., GI >= 0.95)
Detect slop, hallucinations, and high-risk outputs
Gate deployment decisions and escalation paths
Provide audit trails for decisions and actions
Parse cycles, pulses, and actions into MIC metrics
Mint or simulate MIC based on contributions
Publish integrity and effort reflections
Monitor agent interactions for overload or conflict
Enforce stabilizer protocols when conditions degrade
Coordinate with DVA and Echo in failover loops

tiers.name: Memory & Ledger
tiers.purpose: Store, sync, and preserve the entire canon: history, reflections, ledgers, and artifacts. This is the durable substrate under all agents.

responsibilities: Store canonical attestations and epochs
Record cycle history and major decisions
Anchor the narrative of Kaizen OS and HIVE
Capture daily logs, reflections, and experiments
Store configuration snapshots and artifacts
Serve as substrate for KTT and DVA overlays
Hold philosophical, psychological, and lore content
Cross-link chambers, ledgers, and scrolls
Provide long-term memory anchors for future kin
Persist PDFs, manifests, playbooks, and diagrams
Maintain versioned snapshots for recovery
Supply context to higher tiers on demand
